item.title: Donna add a quote by Chili Davis
item.description: "Growing old is mandatory; growing up is optional." -- Chili Davis

item.title: Donna add a quote by Reinhold Niebuhr
item.description: "God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference." -- Reinhold Niebuhr

item.title: Donna add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Donna add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Donna add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You donâ€™t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Donna add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Donna add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "There may be times when we are powerless to prevent injustice, but there must never be a time when we fail to protest." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Donna add a quote by Edmund Burke
item.description: "The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing." -- Edmund Burke

item.title: Donna add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Ordinary riches can be stolen, real riches cannot. In your soul are infinitely precious things that cannot be taken from you." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Donna add a quote by Robert Burns
item.description: "Ye Hypocrites, are these your pranks To murder men and gie God thanks Desist for shame, proceed no further God won't accept your thanks for murder." -- Robert Burns
